title: Warm Clothing for Pets
description: Dress your pet in sweaters or jackets to protect them from the cold.

title: Protect Their Paws
description: Use paw balm or booties to prevent cracking from cold surfaces.

title: Ensure Proper Hydration
description: Pets need water even in winter — keep their bowl fresh and full.

title: Create a Warm Sleeping Spot
description: Use blankets or heated pads to keep your pet’s bed cozy.
